titles.title: Safeguarding Government from Foreign Corruption Act
Safeguarding Government from Foreign Corruption Act
To expressly provide for the extraterritorial application of the Federal bribery and illegal gratuity statute to the President and other covered officials.
Safeguarding Government from Foreign Corruption Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution and Civil Justice.
